orderLines.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege
orderLines.description: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six® Siege is an elite, tactical team-based shooter where superior planning and execution triumph.
orderLines.specifications:
OS *: Originally released for Windows 7, the game can be played on Windows 10 and Windows 11 OSProcessor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.3 GHz or better or AMD FX-8120 @ 3.1 Ghz or better
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 or AMD Radeon HD 7970

orderLines.name: Elden Ring
orderLines.description: THE NEW FANTASY ACTION RPG. Rise, Tarnished, and be guided by grace to brandish the power of the Elden Ring and become an Elden Lord in the Lands Between.
orderLines.specifications:
Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
OS: Windows 10/11
Processor: INTEL CORE I7-8700K or AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
Memory: 16 GB RAM
Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1070 8 GB or AMD RADEON RX VEGA 56 8 GB
